title: "Fintech CEO Kristy Kim Has Raised $139 Million to Build Gen Z’s Go-To Bank"
excerpt: "Kristy Kim, the company’s founders and CEO, said in an interview: “I am so grateful to our investors. This will allow us to diversify our product offering.” Kim was born in South Korea, and launched the company in part due to her personal difficulty obtaining credit when she arrived in the United States."
